newsitem.title: NEW ZEALAND: Mercury withdraws all offers for PNZ shrs.
newsitem.headline: Mercury withdraws all offers for PNZ shrs.

text.p: Unlisted Auckland-based electricity supplier Mercury Energy said on Tuesday it had withdrawn all of its offers for shares in Power New Zealand.
Mercury, for more than two years, has been locked in a battle with U.S.-based UtiliCorp United Inc for control of its fellow Auckland electricity distributor.
Mercury has around 31 percent of Power NZ while Utilicorp, through Utilicorp New Zealand Ltd, around 28 percent.
Spokesmen for all three parties were not immediately available for comment on the latest developments.
